entities.name: norbert

entities.name: malfoy

entities.name: filch

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione shook hands with others, indicating a friendly or celebratory atmosphere.
Norbert was being kept by Harry, Ron, and Hermione, but it is released at the end of the passage.
Malfoy will be in detention due to Norbert's escape, indicating that Malfoy was affected by Norbert's actions.
Filch confronted Harry, Ron, and Hermione at the end of the passage, indicating a negative or confrontational relationship.
